As thanks for your continued support, yo.message: As thanks for your continued support, you have been given the new TITANS expansion for free!

If you ignore this recommendation by ena.message: If you ignore this recommendation by enabling offline play, you may experience degraded performance.

If you want to play Classic PA, it's rec.message: If you want to play Classic PA, it's recommended you run TITANS and simply change your Active Expansion in the gameplay settings.

Often these types of crashes can be reso.message: Often these types of crashes can be resolved by making sure you have the latest graphics driver from __vendor_name__ — and we [strong]strongly recommend[/strong] that you visit their driver website to download and install the latest version.

Oops! We can't find the game in your acc.message: Oops! We can't find the game in your account.  If you are a Steam user, please restart Steam and try again.  If the problem persists, contact us at __email__

Oops! Your account seems to be in an inv.message: Oops! Your account seems to be in an invalid state. If you are a Steam user, please restart Steam and try again. If the problem persists, contact us at __email__

Please enjoy all the new units, new worl.message: Please enjoy all the new units, new worlds, and new ways to annihilate everything!

Please exit the game, find it in your St.message: Please exit the game, find it in your Steam library, right click it, select Properties, and make sure that "Enable the Steam Overlay while in-game" is checked. After doing so, start the game and try again.

Please try again later. If this error p.message: Please try again later.  If this error persists, please contact support and check the forums.

Sign in with your PlayFab ID.message: Sign in with your PlayFab ID

The HUGE stand-alone expansion to Planet.message: The HUGE stand-alone expansion to Planetary Annihilation is here, featuring 5 world-shattering TITANS, 16 new units, new worlds and more!

Your machine does not meet the recommend.message: Your machine does not meet the recommended system requirements for offline play — for offline mode we recommend at least 8 gigabytes of RAM and a Quad Core processor.
